11#include "blockd.h"
12
13void vp8_setup_block_dptrs(MACROBLOCKD *x) {
14 int r, c;
15
16 for (r = 0; r < 4; ++r) {
17 for (c = 0; c < 4; ++c) {
18 x->block[r * 4 + c].predictor = x->predictor + r * 4 * 16 + c * 4;
19 }
20 }
21
22 for (r = 0; r < 2; ++r) {
23 for (c = 0; c < 2; ++c) {
24 x->block[16 + r * 2 + c].predictor =
25 x->predictor + 256 + r * 4 * 8 + c * 4;
26 }
27 }
28
29 for (r = 0; r < 2; ++r) {
30 for (c = 0; c < 2; ++c) {
31 x->block[20 + r * 2 + c].predictor =
32 x->predictor + 320 + r * 4 * 8 + c * 4;
33 }
34 }
35
36 for (r = 0; r < 25; ++r) {
37 x->block[r].qcoeff = x->qcoeff + r * 16;
38 x->block[r].dqcoeff = x->dqcoeff + r * 16;
39 x->block[r].eob = x->eobs + r;
40 }
41}
42
43void vp8_build_block_doffsets(MACROBLOCKD *x) {
44 int block;
45
46 for (block = 0; block < 16; ++block) /* y blocks */
47 {
48 x->block[block].offset =
49 (block >> 2) * 4 * x->dst.y_stride + (block & 3) * 4;
50 }
51
52 for (block = 16; block < 20; ++block) /* U and V blocks */
53 {
54 x->block[block + 4].offset = x->block[block].offset =
55 ((block - 16) >> 1) * 4 * x->dst.uv_stride + (block & 1) * 4;
56 }
57}
